Name: Cold Silence
About the game: This is minimalistic horror platformer about surviving in snowy mountains. Follow the voice from the radio, fight your fears and reveal the truth! Features: - horror without darkness, it's creepy because of the situation itself - only 3 colors convey the sense of despair - seamless game world - unique bosses and secrets - 5 difficulty modes
Meta Title: Cold Silence: May 30, 2019, SaintHeiser and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Cold Silence? Check out the release date (May 30, 2019), developer insights from SaintHeiser, and a complete game summary.
